name: Burg_52
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Riveric loanwords
diet heavy on salted fish, seaweed, fermented shellfish
practical clothing layered for wind and salt
constraints: no instant resurrection or life-replacement magics
long-range mind influence rare and institutionally banned
ritual magic consumes scarce imported reagents
notes: population data unavailable; functions as low-population coastal node
near-medieval to early-industrial tech with localized ritual practices
